main event: A witness observed 27 unidentified flying objects in Galena, Illinois on March 17, 1967.
interesting points: The objects had lights of red, green, and amber colors that were bright and steady., They appeared round in shape resembling a sorcerer's hat and were about the size of a basketball., The objects were observed for 15 minutes before disappearing after slowing down., The witness indicated that the objects were completely silent., The sighting occurred in cloudy daytime conditions.
witness description: The witness was an 18-year-old male named (Redacted) from Collison, Illinois.
